mapper.select: select fno, cateName as cate, name, title, content, DATE_FORMAT(resdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS resdate, views, recommend from free f join category c on (f.cate = c.cate) where fno = #{fno}
mapper.insert: insert into free values(default, #{cate}, #{name}, #{title}, #{content}, default, default, default)
mapper.update: update free set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where fno = #{fno}
update free set views = views + 1 where fno = #{fno}
update free set recommend = #{recommend} where fno = #{fno}
